name: Rotface

topics.topic_text: Sorry, maybe another time.
topics.response_text: I understand. Well, have a good day.

topics.topic_text: Sure, here you go.
topics.response_text: The first thing you should know is that Freeside is run by a pack of yahoos that call themselves the Kings.

topics.topic_text: Are you soliciting me?
topics.response_text: Ha ha ha, oh that's rich. You're not exactly my type, no offense. No, I meant I could give you a tip. Earn my money, so to speak.

topics.topic_text: What kind of tip?
topics.response_text: You look like you're new around here, so I'm sure I know all sorts of things you'd find useful. If not, well, it's only a cap.

topics.topic_text: GREETING
topics.response_text: Hey buddy, spare a cap? I can make it worth your while.

topics.topic: VFreeformFreesideVFSRotfaceTopic000{Ask if he's heard about NCR soldiers in the area.}
topics.topic_text: You know anything about NCR soldiers prowling the area?
topics.response_text: Could be. Could be. That kind of information doesn't come cheap, though. I'll need at least 150 caps for this one.

topics.topic_text: You drive a hard bargain. Here you go.
topics.response_text: Much appreciated. The guys you're talking about have been spotted near the old train station in the northwest.

topics.topic_text: If you ever want me to buy another tip from you, that price'll come down.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] You're a scoundrel. I'll let it go for 50, but no lower.

topics.topic_text: Done.
topics.response_text: Much appreciated. The guys you're talking about have been spotted near the old train station in the northwest.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, too rich for me.
topics.response_text: Then I can't help you with that, but I do have lots of other tips that come much, much cheaper...

topics.topic_text: Do you know the password?
topics.response_text: It'll cost you 250 caps.

topics.topic_text: I've already paid good money for this information. A hundred more caps, no more.
topics.response_text: [SUCCEEDED] Fine, fine. One hundred it is, but only because you're a good customer.

topics.topic_text: Fine.
topics.response_text: Much appreciated. The guys you're talking about have been spotted near the old train station in the northwest.

topics.topic_text: Here you go.
topics.response_text: Wow, I might have to head down to the Wrangler tonight with all these caps weighing me down.

topics.topic_text: Thanks, I'll go check it out.
topics.response_text: Good luck!

topics.topic_text: Whoa, now. Watch where you point that thing. It's dangerous.
topics.response_text: Dangerous... I like that. Maybe it's time people starting being afraid of me rather than the other way around.

topics.topic_text: Sorry, too rich for me.
topics.response_text: Then I can't help you with that, but I do have lots of other tips that come much, much cheaper...

topics.topic_text: { Holder for Rotface extra lines }
topics.response_text: Hey, listen, I'd love to sell you some more info, but you've tapped everything I've heard lately.

topics.topic_text: Yeah, it looks great.
topics.response_text: Exactly what I was thinking. It's nice to have a little style, you know?

topics.topic_text: It's not exactly what I would have bought for myself.
topics.response_text: Oh yeah, what would you have gotten?

topics.topic_text: Good for you. No one should have to be afraid all the time.
topics.response_text: Unfortunately, it comes with the territory around here. But being afraid sucks, no doubt about it.

topics.topic_text: You look like an idiot.
topics.response_text: Yeah, it does look pretty sweet, doesn't{it}i- hey, screw you! Who asked you anyway? The crap I put up with...

topics.topic_text: Probably a weapon, given how dangerous it is around here.
topics.response_text: Yeah... that's a good idea... no sense making money and waiting for someone to just come and take it, right?

topics.topic_text: I'd have saved the money, so I could someday get the hell out of here.
topics.response_text: Hmmm... you're a long-term thinker, man. I like that. You might be on to something there.

topics.topic_text: I'd have given the money away.
topics.response_text: ...Really? Wow, it never occurred to me to actually give the money away. Do people really do things like that?{Long pause at the beginning as he's trying to decide if he heard the player right.}

topics.topic_text: Now you'll get some respect. You should give some hell to the people that used to push you around.
topics.response_text: Yeah... yeah, that's a good idea. They'll learn that shouldn't have messed with me. Just wait till they get what's coming to them!

topics.topic_text: No, you could make a real difference.
topics.response_text: You really think so, pal? I'll start looking into it. I bet I can help a lot of people around here.

topics.topic_text: Freeside's problems are too big for you to have much impact.
topics.response_text: You're probably right. This place has been going downhill for a long time. Maybe I could start over somewhere else.

topics.topic_text: You believed that crap I said about giving the money away?
topics.response_text: What? N-No, I knew you were just kidding. Ha ha. You're a funny one, all right.

topics.topic_text: I go places all the time. It's actually pretty easy to just pick up and leave.
topics.response_text: That's true, you seem to always be on the move and it seems to be working out for you pretty well.

topics.topic_text: You wouldn't last ten seconds out in the waste.
topics.response_text: That's a hell of a thing to say. Build up a man's hopes, then dash them in front of him.

topics.topic_text: Sure, but what about this place? Isn't it your home?
topics.response_text: This place is a shithole, but yeah, it's home. I've lived here all my life. I'd be leaving a piece of myself behind if I left.

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry. Sorry you're such a prissy asshole.
topics.response_text: You're a real piece of work, you know that?

topics.topic_text: I'm sorry. I was out of line before.
topics.response_text: It's cool. I'm just a little touchy about people making fun of me, especially smoothskins. But you're not all bad. Take the Followers, for example.

topics.topic_text: I've already forgotten it.
topics.response_text: Yeah, I bet you have. Not important enough for you to remember, huh?

topics.topic_text: Very classy.
topics.response_text: You said it. With these threads, people are finally going to start noticing me.

topics.topic_text: As good as a ghoul in a suit can look.
topics.response_text: Fuck you, human. We don't all share your wonderful complexion. Some of us have to make do, you know?

topics.topic_text: I don't care. Do you have any new info?
topics.response_text: Yeesh, you're just all business, aren't you? Well, I like how I look, and that's what's important. Though it'd be nice if other people did too.{Emphasis on the first "I" in "I like how I look". Also, the last sentence is said quickly and slightly under his breath.}

topics.topic_text: Sure. What is it?
topics.response_text: I don't want to mention it out in plain sight like this. You never know who might be listening. Follow me.

topics.topic_text: No right now. I'm busy.
topics.response_text: Well, don't wait too long. What I've got is something you'd need to act on, quick.

topics.topic_text: Don't shoot! Here you go.
topics.response_text: Wow, I didn't think it would be this easy. I should have done this years ago. Guess I'll be going then.

topics.topic_text: Why are you doing this?
topics.response_text: Man, I'm tired of scrounging for caps from ungrateful idiots like you. It's past time I moved on to bigger and better things.

topics.topic_text: I'm not giving you my caps.
topics.response_text: Then you give me no choice.

topics.topic_text: I have a better idea. Why don't I just take all my caps back from your corpse?
topics.response_text: You're welcome to try.

description:
Rotface is a 120 year-old Ghoul Male.

A weathered ghoul beggar with decaying skin and a raspy voice, Rotface has made Freeside his home for decades. He sits hunched against the ruins of a pre-War building near Mick & Ralph's, his eyes constantly scanning the comings and goings of travelers through Freeside's east gate.

Rotface's Personality: Opportunistic and talkative, Rotfish thrives on information. He's seen too much of the wasteland to be naive, but his isolation has made him desperate for human interaction. He's willing to trade gossip for caps, always looking to profit from what he knows.

Rotface's Backstory: Born before the Great War, Rotface was transformed into a ghoul during the nuclear devastation of 2077. He wandered the Mojave for decades before settling in Freeside, where his longevity and keen observation skills made him a repository of local knowledge. Though he could probably find safer work, Rotface prefers the freedom of begging and gossiping, collecting bits of information that others might find valuable.
